Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class Notation.Connection

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.Notation.Connection
Enclosing class:
Notation
public static final class Notation.Connection extends Object
Represents a connection between notes affected by the same connected notation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Notation.Connection
    beginningOf(Notation notation, GraceNote followingNote)
    Returns a connection with the given connected notation from the first note affected by the notation.
    static Notation.Connection
    beginningOf(Notation notation, Note followingNote)
    Returns a connection with the given connected notation from the first note affected by the notation.
    static Notation.Connection
    endOf(Notation notation)
    Returns a notation connection with the given notation that is used to denote the last note affected by the notation.
    Optional<GraceNote>
    getFollowingGraceNote()
    Returns the following grace note, i.e., the grace note to which this connects.
    Iterable<GraceNote>
    getFollowingGraceNotes()
    Returns all following grace notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs.
    Optional<Note>
    getFollowingNote()
    Returns the following note, i.e., the note to which this connects.
    Iterable<Note>
    getFollowingNotes()
    Returns all following notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs.

    Returns the notation to which this connection belongs.

    getType()
    Returns the type of this notation.

    Returns true if this denotes the connection starting from the first note affected by the notation.

      followingNote - the grace note to which this connects

    • endOf

      public static Notation.Connection endOf(Notation notation)
      Returns a notation connection with the given notation that is used to denote the last note affected by the notation.
      Parameters:
      notation - the notation to which this connection belongs
      Returns:
      a notation connection with the given notation that is used to denote the last note affected by the notation

    • getNotation

      public Notation getNotation()
      Returns the notation to which this connection belongs.
      Returns:
      the notation to which this connection belongs

    • getFollowingNote

      public Optional<Note> getFollowingNote()
      Returns the following note, i.e., the note to which this connects. If this connection does not connect to a note or denotes the last note affected by the notation, then returns empty.
      Returns:
      the following note

    • getFollowingGraceNote

      public Optional<GraceNote> getFollowingGraceNote()
      Returns the following grace note, i.e., the grace note to which this connects. If this connection does not connect to a grace note or denotes the last note affected by the notation, then returns empty.
      Returns:
      the following grace note

    • getFollowingNotes

      public Iterable<Note> getFollowingNotes()
      Returns all following notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs.
      Returns:
      all following notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs

    • getFollowingGraceNotes

      public Iterable<GraceNote> getFollowingGraceNotes()
      Returns all following grace notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs.
      Returns:
      all following grace notes that are affected by the same notation to which this notation connection belongs

    • isBeginning

      public boolean isBeginning()
      Returns true if this denotes the connection starting from the first note affected by the notation.
      Returns:
      true if this denotes the connection starting from the first note affected by the notation

    • isEnd

      public boolean isEnd()
      Returns true if this denotes the end of the notation.
      Returns:
      true if this denotes the end of the notation

      public Notation.Type getType()
      Returns the type of this notation.
